LanguageData.MagiaPlant.Update.Title: MagiaPlant Update
LanguageData.MagiaPlant.Update.label:
2023/05/25(0.2.0.0): *B.E.P Race Core is required as a prerequisite mod, and common parts have been greatly reduced. If you are using an earlier version, various data such as hairstyles and clothes have been lost. If you need an older version, you can download the mod before the update by going to github from the mod page.
2023/03/27(0.1.1.0): *Fixed some graphics
*Separated FacialAnimation definitions into separate mods To reduce the load at startup, I have separated FacialAnimation images and definitions into separate mods. Please subscribe from the collection.
2023/03/16(0.1.0.0): *Upload
